title: Which university in the Netherlands is best known internationally? - Quora
tags: Colleges and Universities in the Netherlands

response.answer_text: It really depends a lot on the field. Delft is known for architecture and waterway construction Eindhoven is known for design Wageningen is known for agricultural technologies Rotterdam for Economics (tias/nimbas) Leiden for international law Amsterdam for humanities
A2A. None are very well known. Probably the best known is U of Amsterdam, a bit ahead of Erasmus. After them, I probably see U of Utrecht and Leiden.
